key.name: start-on-login
key.description: Start Ring on login. Only supported on XDG compliant desktop environments.

key.name: show-status-icon
key.description: When set to true Ring will continue to run if the main window is closed.

key.name: bring-window-to-front
key.summary: Bring window to foreground on incoming calls.
key.description: Bring window to foreground on incoming calls.

key.name: show-main-window
key.summary: Saves whether or not the main window is currently visible or not.
key.description: This is used when launching the application with the '--restore-last-window-state' option, which will launch the application with the main window in the same state as when Ring was last quit.

key.name: chat-pane-horizontal
key.summary: Display the chat to the rigth (default) or at the bottom.
key.description: If the chat pane is horizontal then the chat is displayed to the right of the video; otherwise it will be displayed bellow it.

key.name: enable-chat-notifications
key.summary: Enable notifications for new chat messages.

key.name: search-entry-places-call
key.summary: Entering a number in the search entry places a new call.
key.description: Entering a number in the search entry places a new call. If false, then this will instead open a chat view.

key.name: selected-account
key.description: The account id of the user selected account; if empty there is no valid account selected.
